methodology.description: This calculator combines US Census Bureau data on marital status with Pew Research Center data on religious demographics to estimate the number of unmarried Christian women by age bracket.
limitations: Data is based on surveys with sampling error
Marriage market is not geographically uniform
Individual preferences and circumstances vary widely
calculations: Christian population = Total population × Christian percentage for age bracket
Religiosity filter = Christian population × religiosity percentage
Unmarried = Never married + Divorced + Widowed (if included)
Surplus = Unmarried Christian Women - Available Unmarried Christian Men
